query: Please plan a 3-day trip for a group of 7 people from Salt Lake City to Burbank, with the journey taking place from March 12th to March 14th, 2022. During our time in Burbank, we wish to visit a solitary city. Our new budget is $7,600 for the trip. For accommodations, we would like to have entire rooms.
